name: Squares (itch) (yyam)
description:
This game was made as a late entry for LOWREZJAM 2019. Source code can be found on GitHub

Supported browsers: Firefox and Chrome

Instructions

Use the UP and DOWN arrow keys to avoid the obstacles as you get carried by the music.

Press ENTER/RETURN (RTN) to select menu options.

Credits

Code/Art/Music: Pedro K. Custodio.

Follow me on twitter @yyamdev
